code: module.exports={save:function save(file,cpm,name,message,correctChr,wrongChr,callback){if(name.length&&message.length){var result={file:file,cpm:cpm,name:name,message:message,correctChr:correctChr,wrongChr:wrongChr};fetch("/records",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(result)}).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(res){if(res.success){callback(true);}else{alert(res.message);}}).catch(function(err){alert("서버 연결이 원활하지 않습니다.\n ["+err+"]");});}},load:function load(page){return new Promise(function(resolve,reject){fetch("/records?page="+page,{method:"GET"}).then(function(res){resolve(res.json());}).catch(function(err){reject(err);});});}};
